name: Manjari Edwards
title: Engineering Manager at Edward Jones
text:
Brent is an experienced iOS Engineer with over 10 years of experience in iOS app development. Brent has consistently demonstrated a strong proficiency in developing innovative and user-friendly iOS applications, making significant contributions to every project he has been a part of. Throughout our time working together, I have been consistently impressed with Brent's technical expertise and problem-solving skills. His deep knowledge of iOS development best practices, combined with his ability to adapt to changing technologies, ensures that the apps he develops are of the highest quality and functionality.

In addition to his technical skills, Brent is a great team player who actively collaborates with his colleagues and is always willing to offer his expertise and assistance. His excellent communication skills and strong work ethic make him a valuable asset to any team. Brent is direct in feedback, agile mindset person and can help teams that needs honest guidance. His passion for his work, dedication to excellence, and unwavering commitment to producing top-notch applications make him an exceptional candidate.
highlight: Purpose Driven leader, who helps purpose driven people on their career path, thereby builds tools and technologies for the product.

name: Benjamin Hotrabhavananda
title: iOS Developer at Edward Jones
relationship: Benjamin worked with Brent on the same team
text:
I had the pleasure of working with Brent at Edward Jones, where our paths frequently crossed, particularly during code reviews. Brent consistently impressed me with his exceptional debugging skills and his calm, methodical approach to solving complex issues. His ability to remain composed under pressure and provide insightful suggestions was invaluable to my work.

Brent is also a fearless leader within our iOS team chapter meetings. He fosters an environment of open communication and support, making himself approachable and always available to assist. One memorable instance was when he went out of his way to help me debug a particularly challenging piece of code. His guidance not only resolved the issue but also enhanced my understanding of the problem.

Brent's dedication, problem-solving skills, and leadership qualities make him an outstanding asset to any team. I highly recommend him and am confident that he will excel in any future endeavors.
highlight: Exceptional debugging skills and calm, methodical approach to solving complex issues. A fearless leader within our iOS team.

name: Praveen Miranda
title: iOS Developer at Edward Jones
relationship: Praveen worked with Brent on the same team for 3 years
text: I have worked with Brent for almost 3 years at Edward Jones on the same team. He is absolutely a phenomenal iOS Developer. He has very deep knowledge of the iOS frameworks, languages like Swift, Objective-C and other arsenal in a typical iOS Developer's toolkit. We have worked closely on multiple awesome features for Edward Jones applications. He is always up for learning and trying out new things. He is very confident in his skills and generally believes nothing is impossible to do with some code. A true professional who writes very high quality code and works very well in a team environment. He is always ever ready to help other people on the team when they need help. I would highly recommend him to anyone looking to hire him.
highlight: Absolutely a phenomenal iOS Developer with very deep knowledge of iOS frameworks, Swift, and Objective-C.

name: Dave Pedersen
title: iOS Developer at Edward Jones
relationship: Dave worked with Brent as a fellow iOS developer
text: Brent was fantastic to have as a fellow iOS developer. He constantly strived to not only create the most efficient code possible, but also to improve existing code to best standards and practices. He brought humor and insight to our meetings. I hope I will get the opportunity to work with him again.
highlight: Constantly strived to create the most efficient code possible and improve existing code to best standards and practices.

name: Dan Benner
title: Software Engineer at Edward Jones
text: Brent is an accomplished developer and an outspoken leader. He demonstrated on a daily basis his expertise in all things iOS related. He has a passion for learning and an even greater enthusiasm for teaching. He isn't afraid to challenge the status quo while maintaining a firm stance on always improving what can be improved. I would gladly work alongside Brent in any regard.
highlight: A passion for learning and an even greater enthusiasm for teaching. Expert in all things iOS.

name: Kaz Michael Karl
title: Senior Software Developer at Boeing
relationship: Kaz worked with Brent on the Boeing 787 project
text:
I think of myself as one of the best of the best of the best, and that's what the team I was on with Brent was intended by Taleisin to be, on the Boeing 787 project. They called us the Four Musketeers, and we were brought in to rescue a project that was only five weeks from deadline, but months from completion. Despite one member proving inadequate and dropping out, we got the project done essentially on time, surpassing expectations.

That is the competitive setting to keep in mind when I say that I was astonished with how skilled Brent is. It's the first time in over a decade that I felt like I had someone I wanted to be like, instead of feeling I am the role model for others on a given project. His ability to absorb and refactor an entire code base is beyond what I realized people could do, an ability worth striving to emulate.

He also has unusually good character, and more people skill than most techies, which is a huge advantage in the development world, helping facilitate the communication necessary to get multi-member projects coordinated and done well.
highlight: Ability to absorb and refactor an entire code base is beyond what I realized people could do. Unusually good character and people skills.

name: Derrick Baier
title: Program Manager at NJVC
relationship: Derrick worked with Brent at NJVC
text: Brent has been an amazing addition to NJVC. His experience in web and software development lifecycle is bar none and he is focused on the success of the company. Highly recommended.
highlight: Experience in web and software development lifecycle is bar none.

name: Calvin Horrell
title: Account Manager at Technology Partners
relationship: Calvin placed Brent at three different client sites
text: Brent is an outstanding resource if you have any Perl or Unix resource needs. I know he has been expanding his knowledge base over the past few years and can also contribute in other areas. He did a fantastic job for us at three different client sites prior to converting to be a full time employee after the last client assignment we had for him.
highlight: Outstanding resource. Did a fantastic job at three different client sites.

name: Josh Bahr
title: Director at Technology Partners
relationship: Josh managed Brent's contracts over 10 years
text: Brent has worked for Technology Partners on 3 separate contracts over the 10 years I have been with the company. Our clients were all very pleased with Brent's ability to add value to their projects as a software developer.
highlight: Clients were all very pleased with Brent's ability to add value to their projects.

name: Todd Stoner
title: CFO at Technology Partners
relationship: Todd oversaw Brent's contracts as CFO
text: In my 5 years as CFO for Technology Partners, Brent worked for Technology Partners as an IT contractor for several of our clients. The clients were very pleased with his work. This was evidenced by the amount of time he was retained by the clients and the positive feedback we received from the client project managers. Brent has both a great attitude and a great work ethic.
highlight: Great attitude and great work ethic. Clients were very pleased with his work.
